Deep Learning On Time Series Data

Mar 31, 2016

Abstract

This project will focus on the applications of deep machine learning on time series data from the Catalina Sky Survey Telescope. This project will focus on the development of algorithms that will classify time series data in an efficient and accurate way, with minimal manual intervention.

People

  • Professor Robert J. Brunner, Department of Astronomy
  • Sushma Adari, Department of Astronomy and Department of Computer Science
